email.subject: Subject
email.txtFilesCreated: {{count}} TXT files created with {{total}} email addresses in total.
email.splitConfirm: {{count}} recipients will be split into {{groups}} .eml files. Continue?
email.sendingError: Error sending emails. Please try again.
email.messageTemplate: Your message here... Use {{nom}} and {{prenom}} to personalize
email.studyEmailTemplate:
Hello {{prenom}} {{nom}},

We have a new cosmetic study that might interest you.

Your profile perfectly matches the criteria we are looking for in this study.

For more information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
The CosmeTest Team
email.reminderEmailTemplate:
Hello {{prenom}} {{nom}},

We would like to remind you of your participation in our cosmetic study.

Please confirm your availability as soon as possible.

Best regards,
The CosmeTest Team
email.followUpEmailTemplate:
Hello {{prenom}} {{nom}},

We hope you are well.

Following your participation in our last study, we would like to hear your feedback.

Best regards,
The CosmeTest Team
